desc: Ripplebrook is a second generation family vineyard producing premium wines from our organic, single vineyard site. We make Sparkling, Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, Merlot, Shiraz and Cabernet Sauvignon. Our cellar door restaurant "Giuseppes" is situated on our vineyard and showcases the breathtaking views of Mt Baw Baw.

layout.text: Come and sit in front of our wood-fired pizza oven and take advantage of the breaktaking Mount Baw Baw views
